name: Severed VR Prototype
description:
Severed VR is a horror simulation were you take the role of a young woman targeted by a serial killer, 

You wake up in a dark cave cell with the horrible smell of death and decay all around you its your job to look around this cell area and find anything that may give you a hint as to why you were targeted and to find out if there is a chance to escape this horrible situation.

As you explore the cell you will find notes from past victims, interactable objects such as a flashlight, rusty pipe, notes, pillows etc. 

The best way to experience the game is to put yourself in the mindset of  the victim as this game is meant to be an experience where the narrative is told thought-out the environment itself.

Very early stages I am making this game as a project for my degree so I cant say for certain if it will get a finished version.
